about_the_game:
Glass Heart Soundtrack features 29 original compositions and 2 original songs composed by Michael Noble and Joshua Taipale. This is a total of 31 different songs that you can enjoy!

Our compositions fit any mood that you may be feeling and are perfect for relaxation, inspiration and remembering your favorite moments from Glass Heart.

This soundtrack features the songs (Wild) and (Melody Of Love) in their full glory!

Wild
Composition and Lyrics by: Michael Noble
Singer: Connor Miranda

Melody of Love
Composed by: Joshua Taipale
Lyrics by: Korina Gattoc
Singers: (Wished to remain anonymous)

©2023 Eternal Love Studios, LLC. All rights reserved

content_descriptors.notes:
Glass Heart contains the follow mature content/themes:
1. Substance Use (consensual and non-consensual)
2. Sexual Assault
3. Physical Assault
4. Consensual Sexual Scenes (No Nudity)

Please note that in Glass Heart, you have the option to skip scenes containing the content mentioned above, if you so choose.
